name: Entrepreneurship Development Center

address: NCL Innovation Park, Dr Homi Bhabha Road,

briefDescription: Venture Center (Pune, India) is a not-for-profit business incubator that helps early stage science and technology ventures. Venture Center is Supported by National Chemical Laboratory-CSIR and Department of Science and Technology-NSTEDB, India. Venture Center provides lab infrastructure and business Support services, seed funding and technology commercialization programs. It also provides access to start up mentors, venture investors and high quality industry referals.
